Second manual tick to validate wrap-around with maximumValue=2 (valid values 0..1). Starting from 1, ChangeTimeValue() should wrap to 0, NextValue is null so no cascade. Verify units.TurnSelectedWithButton(0).

MonoBehaviour fileID 944 (guid 6dbca64e524ea44f9b26142ec59aca8a) is GvrAudioSource. Scene config: playOnAwake=0, clip guid=3b1bac9d0cdfad24e9ffb75aa75e4f96, loop=0, volume=1, occlusionEnabled=0. Since playOnAwake is false, audio will not start automatically; explicitly invoke Play() to initialize and start playback.
After playback has started via Play(), pause playback to validate Pause() behavior. GvrAudioSource.Pause() sets isPaused=true and pauses the internal AudioSource.
With playback paused, resume using UnPause() to confirm audio continues and isPaused=false.
Stop playback and validate that ShutdownSource() runs (spatializer Id set to -1, ZeroOutput=1) and a subsequent Play() would re-initialize.
